resources.string: Mobile Device Sensor by Fraunhofer CESE

The MADCAP (Mobile Application Data CAPture) app collects data for research on mobile device security.

The app records information such as which apps are running, the device's GPS location, and when a call is made. This app DOES NOT collect sensitive content, such as your contact list, the content of SMS messages, or your browsing history.

The app periodically uploads its data to a remote server when you are connected to a WiFi network. You may turn data collection on or off at any time using the toggle switch below.

Please vists https://www.fc-md.umd.edu/madcap for more information.
